{"step_by_step_thinking": "Mgo, or Magnesium oxide, when added to alginate powder, is known to modify its physical properties. It doesn't necessarily increase the surface character or shelf life of the alginate. However, it does have an impact on the strength of the alginate. More specifically, it increases the shear and tear strength of the alginate, making it more resistant to breaking or tearing under stress.", "answer_choice": "C"}
